Class: ShapeBorder

DrawerJs.plugins. ShapeBorder

new ShapeBorder(drawer, options)

Provides toolbar controls for configuring border size and color. Uses colorpicker plugin, so depends on it.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
drawer DrawerJs.Drawer Instance of DrawerJs.Drawer.
options Object Configuration object.
Properties
Name Type Description
color String Default border color.
borderTypes String Object with all borders that will be available for selection

Example: 
"None": {
  width: 0,
  description: 'None'
},
"Solid thin": {
  width: 1,
  preview: this.assetsFolder + 'border-solid-thin.png'
},
defaultBorder String Border that will be selected when object is created.
Source:
  • plugins/options-shape-border/ShapeBorder.js, line 41

Members

assetsFolder :String

Option name. On selecting tool/object, if this.toolName is in array of object allowed options - tool will show controls
Type:
  • String
Source:
  • plugins/options-shape-border/ShapeBorder.js, line 55

onActivateTool(tool)

Update controls a If activated tool is Line/Arrow: 1) save old values of borderColor and border type 2) make current border color same as drawer active color 3) make current border 'Solid thin'
Parameters:
Name Type Description

updateColorFromObject(object)

Sets this.currentColor same as object stroke color, or TRASPARENT if object has no stroke
Parameters:
Name Type Description
object fabric.Object
Source:
  • plugins/options-shape-border/ShapeBorder.js, line 160

updateControls()

Updates UI to reflect selected border and color. Hides colorpicker if current border is 'None'
Source:
  • plugins/options-shape-border/ShapeBorder.js, line 385

updateControlsFromObject(fabricEvent, fabricEvent)

When an object is selected on canvas we want to reflect that object's color and border type on the toolbar. This method checks selected object type and if it's a shape it gets that shape's color and border type and sets them as active on the color/border selection toolbar.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
fabricEvent
fabricEvent
Source:
  • plugins/options-shape-border/ShapeBorder.js, line 144

updateStrokeFromObject(object)

Sets this.currentBorder same as object stroke, if object border patten matches with one of predefined patterns.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
object fabric.Object
